snippet: The rapper Chief Keef serves as a reminder of what’s been whitewashed out of the hip-hop mainstream: a sense of the struggle in the communities that produce much of the music.
abstract: Chief Keef, an up-and-coming rapper known for his atavistic behavior, and the Chicago music scene he's come to symbolize serve as a reminder of what’s been whitewashed out of mainstream hip-hop: a sense of struggle in the communities that produce much of the music.
lead_paragraph: The rapper Chief Keef serves as a reminder of what’s been whitewashed out of the hip-hop mainstream: a sense of the struggle in the communities that produce much of the music.

headline.main: Chicago Hip-Hop’s Raw Burst of Change
headline.print_headline: Chicago Hip-Hop’s Raw Burst Of Change
